availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John S. Cundiff (Hancock County & Daviess County farmer)

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Matilda Ione Purcell Cundiff. Father of Mary Cundiff, Elizabeth Cundiff, Ambrose Cundiff, William T. Cundiff, Harrison Cundiff, Hamilton G. Cundiff, Artimissa E. Cundiff, Daniel B. Cundiff, Julia Cundiff, Susan Cundiff, James B. Cundiff, Rankin R. R. Cundiff, and Jefferson Daviess Cundiff. Farmer in Hancock County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, p. 39. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, Masonville Precinct, p. 7.
